Provides base types for routing

Imports

../../core/constants

Types

PathParamObj = object
  name*: string
  paramType*: string
  defaultValue*: string
  optional*: bool
RequestModelObj = object
  name*: string
  typeName*: string
  target*: string            ## JSON/XML/FormData/X-www-formurlencoded
RouteDataObj = object
  pathParams*: seq[PathParamObj]
  requestModels*: seq[RequestModelObj]
  purePath*: string
  path*: string
RouteObject = JsonNode
